summary.Title: Manager - Brake Engineering
summary.Presentation: Position Overview: We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Manager to lead our application engineering team. This role involves daily dialogue with the team, assigning and followi

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Position Overview: We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Manager to lead our application engineering team. This role involves daily dialogue with the team, assigning and following up on tasks, strengthening collaboration, conducting employee reviews, and initiating training programs.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Lead, direct, evaluate, and develop the engineering team to ensure timely, budget-compliant project completion according to customer requirements.
  • Participate in and ensure the timely development and design of brakes, technical support, including contact with customers and suppliers for project orders.
  • Collaborate with functional and operational managers (e.g., engineering, marketing, product management, sales) to keep the engineering team updated on new product developments and share customer feedback and competitor activity.
  • Provide technical support to Sales, Supply Chain, Quality, and Manufacturing teams.
  • Assist with team throughput and function as an Application Engineer.
  • Perform projects, tasks, and time registration of assignments in Wrike.
  • Maintain workspace tidiness according to 6S standards.

Qualifications:

  • Proven leadership skills with experience in managing engineering teams.
  • Mechanical engineering degree or similar, with a few years of relevant experience.
  • Profound knowledge of mechanics and technical applications.
  • Proficiency in English at a negotiating level, both spoken and written.
  • Experienced in using MS Office and familiar with ERP systems, preferably AXAPTA.
  • Knowledge of stage gate project models (experience with Wrike is a plus).
  • Ability to work independently, maintain a general overview, and adhere to time plans and specifications.
  • Team player with a structured approach to work.
  • Experience working in an ISO environment.
  • Strong safety mindset and behavior.

Why Join Us?

  • Be part of a collaborative and innovative team.
  • Opportunity to lead and develop a talented group of engineers.
  • Engage in challenging projects that drive technological advancements.
  • Competitive salary and benefits package.

If you are a motivated leader with a passion for engineering and a commitment to excellence, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

Application Process: Please submit your resume and cover letter detailing your qualifications and experience.

You are welcome to contact Group Manager, Engineering, Niels Christensen for further information at phone no. +45 63 255 280 or +45 2425 9514 for further information.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Lead, direct, evaluate, and develop the engineering team to ensure timely, budget-compliant project completion according to customer requirements.
  • Participate in and ensure the timely development and design of brakes, technical support, including contact with customers and suppliers for project orders.

  • Provide technical support to Sales, Supply Chain, Quality, and Manufacturing teams.

  • Proficiency in English at a negotiating level, both spoken and written.

If you are a motivated leader with a passion for engineering and a commitment to excellence, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

You are welcome to contact Group Manager, Engineering, Niels Christensen for further information at phone no. +45 63 255 280 or +45 2425 9514 for further information.
